title.narrative: Health System Strengthening and Support Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective (PDO) of the HSSSP is to improve primary and secondary prevention of selected NCDs, increase the efficiency of hospital management, enhance the capacity of the MoH for evidence-based policy making, and strengthen the Government's capacity to respond to COVID-19.

condition.narrative: (a) ensure that no physical or economic displacement, limitation of access to natural resources shall occur before resettlementmeasures under RAP, including, in case of either physical or economic displacement, full payment to Affected Persons of faircompensation at replacement value and of other assistance required for relocation and livelihoods restoration, have beenimplemented;
(b) provide from its own resources, any financing required for any measures under sub-paragraph (a).

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, Para A.1 | Description :The Borrower shall, through MoH, maintain the POMin form and content satisfactory to the Bank, shall duly perform all of its obligations under the Project Operations Document(POM), and shall not assign, amend, abrogate or waive the POM, without the prior approval of the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, Para A.2 | Description :At all times during Project implementation, theBorrower, through MoH, shall operate and maintain the PMSU with functions and responsibilities, qualified staff in sufficientnumbers, adequate funds, facilities, services and other resources for the Project implementation (including financial management,procurement, disbursement and safeguards aspects), all satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, Para A.3 | Description :The Borrower, through MoH, shall ensure that theProject is carried out in accordance with the provisions of the Anti-Corruption Guidelines. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section I, Para C | Description :The Recipient shall not undertake any Projectactivities that involve Resettlement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section II, Para A | Description :The Borrower, through MoH, shall monitor andevaluate the progress of the Project and prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.08 of the GeneralConditions and on the basis of the indicators acceptable to the Bank. Each Project Report shall cover the period of one calendaryear of the Borrower, and shall be furnished to the Bank not later than forty-five (45) days af | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section II, Para B. | Description :The Borrower, through MoH, shall maintain orcause to be maintained a financial management system in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09 of the General Conditions. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section II, Para B.2 | Description :The Borrower, through MOH, shall prepare andfurnish to the Bank, not later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financialreports for the Project covering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Loan Agreement: Schedule 2, Section II, Para B.3 | Description :The Borrower, through MoH, shall have itsFinancial Statements audited in accordance with the provisions of Section 5.09(b) of the General Conditions. Each audit of theFinancial Statements shall cover the period of one calendar year of the Borrower. The audited Financial Statements for each suchperiod shall be furnished to the Bank not later than six months after the end of such period. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 3. Prior to carrying out the bidding process for the Related Activity, the Borrower shallprepare a site-specific ESIA, in accordance with the ESMF, including disclosure and public consultation, in form and substancesatisfactory to the Bank. The Borrower shall ensure the implementation of the provisions of the ESIA for the Related Activity. |Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 4. The Borrower shall: (a) take all necessary actions to minimize, to the extent possible,any involuntary resettlement, in carrying out the Related Activity;| Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 4. The Borrower shall: (b) (iii) furnish such RAP to the Bank for review and approval; (iv)disclose such RAP, at the satisfaction of the Bank; and (v) thereafter adopt such RAP and incorporate it in the POM prior to thecommencement of any civil works relating to such activity; | Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 4. The Borrower shall: (b) in the event the implementation of the Related Activity would giverise to Affected Persons: (i) prepare a RAP in accordance with the applicable Safeguard Instrument; (ii) carry out proper publicconsultations in relation to such RAP; | Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 4. The Borrower shall:(c) thereafter take such measures as shall be necessary or appropriateto ensure full compliance with the requirements of such RAP. | Freq: CONTINUOUS
Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 5: In the event the implementation of the Related Activity would give rise to Affected Persons,the Borrower shall: | Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 6: (b) as soon as reasonably practicable, but no later than thirty (30) days after suchSignificant Event, provide the Bank with a summary report that includes a description of such Significant Event, and the measures,if any, that the Borrower is taking or plans to take to address such Significant Event and to prevent any future similar event;Freq: CONTINUOU
Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 6: (c) keep the Bank informed of the on-going implementation of the said measures and plans. |Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec. I.C of Sch 2 to the Agreement: 6: The Borrower shall:(a) as soon as reasonably practicable, but no later than two (2)calendar days after the occurrence of a Significant Event, inform the Bank by any electronic means of the nature of the incident,accident, or circumstance and any effect or impact (whether on-site or off-site) resulting or likely to result there from; | Freq:CONTINUOUS

Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of Agreement: 9: Prior to carrying out any operations at biosafety level 2 and 3 laboratory facilities under PartIV of Project Borrower shall (i) ensure that such facilities are certified by an external third party, satisfactory to Bank, asbiosafety level 2 and 3 facilities (as applicable) in accordance with standards and procedures referenced in Safeguard Instruments;Freq: CONT

Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of Agreement: 9: Prior to carrying out any operations at biosafety level 2 and 3 laboratory facilities under PartIV of Project Borrower shall (ii) provide such certification to the Bank. Freq: CONT
Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of the Agreement: 10: The Borrower shall not assign, amend, abrogate or waive any of the Safeguards Instrumentswithout the prior approval of the Bank.

Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of the Agreement: 7:(a) measures taken in furtherance of the Safeguards Instruments;(b) conditions, if any,which interfere or threaten to interfere with the implementation of the Safeguards Instruments; and (c) remedial measures takenor required to be taken to address such conditions. Freq: CONTINUOUS

Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of the Agreement: 8: The Borrower shall maintain and publicize the availability of a grievance mechanism, in formand substance satisfactory to the Bank, to hear and determine fairly and in good faith all complaints raised in relation to theProject and take all measures necessary to implement the determinations made by such mechanism in a manner satisfactory to theBank. Freq: CONT

Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of the Agreement: 9: The Borrower shall ensure (i) that annual monitoring of such facilities compliance with thebiosafety level 2 and 3 standards referenced in the Safeguard Instruments is carried out; Freq: CONT

Sec.I.C, Sch 2 of the Agreement: 9: The Borrower shall ensure (ii) that such monitoring is carried out by an external third party,satisfactory to the Bank, until the Borrower has adopted national regulations for such monitoring, satisfactory to the Bank. Freq:CONT

Sec.I.C, Sch 2: 7 Without limitation upon its other reporting obligations under this Sec C of this Sch 2, Borrower shall take allmeasures necessary to regularly collect and compile, and submit to Bank, as part of Project Reports, and promptly in a separatereport whenever circumstances warrant, information on status of compliance with Safeguards Instruments, providing details of: Freq:CONTINUOUS

Section I.C of Schedule 2 to the Agreement: 1. The Borrower shall ensure that Part IV of the Project and the Related Activity iscarried out in accordance with the Safeguard Instruments. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Section I.C of Schedule 2 to the Agreement: 2. Not later than thirty (30) days after the Amendment Effective Date, the Borrowershall, after proper public consultation, adopt and publicly disclose an updated ESMF and SEP for Part IV of the Project and theRelated Activity, all of which shall be in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS
